Articles.Content:
The challenge is simple: reach the highest speed you can before exiting Kerbin SoI.

Rules:

  • No debug menu!
  • No mods (however MechJeb, KJR, athsetics mods, and the like are ok).
  • No save editing.

Now, to keep it somewhat fair, there will be two scoreboards, so that decoupler drives, kraken drives, etc. can still be shown off, but not overshadow normal rockets.

Normal Rockets:

1. Quietsamurai98: 6795.1 m/s

Bug-Based Rockets

1. Quietsamurai98: 3010757.1 m/s

Proof for my entries (neither are very good, just proof of concept):

Javascript is disabled. View full album
